code: import{combineReducers,createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import appReducer from"./app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({appData:appReducer,form:formReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));window.store=store;export default store;
